sections.title: Mystic Theurge (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Mystic Theurge class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Mystic Theurge)
sections.description: Mystic theurges gain no proficiency with any weapon or armor when taking levels in this prestige class.

sections.title: Spells per Day (Mystic Theurge)
sections.description: When gaining a mystic theurge level, the character advances spellcasting in one arcane and one divine class, gaining spells per day and caster level but no other class features.

sections.title: Combined Spells (Su) (Mystic Theurge)
sections.description: Allows preparation and casting of spells from one spellcasting class using spell slots from another class, with the spell occupying a slot one level higher.

sections.title: Spell Synthesis (Su) (Mystic Theurge)
sections.description: At 10th level, allows casting two spells simultaneously (one from each spellcasting class) with one action, imposing -2 save penalties on targets affected by both spells.
